biotools.summary: CLIJx-Assistant is an intuitive user interface for building custom GPU-accelerated image processing workflows using CLIJ2 in Fiji. It visualizes workflows as image date flow graphs while building them. It suggests what to do next and generates scripts and human readable protocols to facilitate reproducible bio-image analysis.
